name: Blackbeard the Cursed Jungle (itch)
description:
Blackbeard is a brave man who fight for honer no matter what the cost. Help him on his adventure to stand against evil.
If you love classic platform games or jungle adventure games, or would you like to return to your childhood memory? Our game Blackbeard the Cursed Jungle is the best choice for you.


- FEATURE -
- Beautiful graphics
- Adventure world
- Awesome gameplay similar to retro classic game
- Run, jump and explore in deep jungle and more
- Easy and intuitive controls
- Many scenes to pass
- Many levels
- Many enemies
- Classic retro platform game style
